title: El gato gordo y otras rimas
description: To the Spanish teacher: These fifteen original poems, written in Spanish, offer a unique approach to teaching the Spanish learner. Many of the poems are humorous, others have a profound message, but they all combine rhythm and rhyme, and the unique characters will add spark to any lesson. They are meant to be recited, illustrated, sung, rapped, acted out and memorized. With all the fun, grammar and new vocabulary are subtly introduced. It’s a win-win for both teachers and students.Laugh at the lizard who lives in my roomRead of the witch eating hotdogs on her broomCheer on the turkey who flies awayLearn of a snake in the library all dayAl niño de habla español: Este libro es para todos los niños, y para el niño que vive dentro de cada adulto. No importa nuestra edad; todos merecemos la oportunidad de reírnos y de soñar, de viajar con nuestra imaginación, y de olvidarnos de los problemas que todos confrontamos en la vida, si fuera sólo por unos momentos.En este libro conocerásUn pavo, una bruja y mucho másCon una culebra estarásDe cada poema aprenderás
author: Barbara Ann Sirotkin
